Line1.F34FB: Please! You have to help! He's out there somewhere!
Line3.11EA18: I'm sorry Damen, we just don't have the folks to go searching for every boy who's stayed out past his bedtime. He'll turn up, I'm sure of it.
VoiceDir1.F34FB: Manic. Your son is the most important thing in the world to you and he's been missing for days
VoiceDir3.11EA18: Empathetic, but pragmatic. Trying to talk a frightened father off the emotional cliff. Kids go 'missing' often, and return home safe after a few hours.
